author: bridge-bot
content:
<yashasvi_yc7> Ah yes, I am aware of these two, I have been working with them. 

Cool, thanks for the information @forshtat (re @forshtat: I remember these two for sure:
ERC-5792: Wallet Call API
ERC-7677: Paymaster Web Service Capability

There are probably others, people in this group should know more. 

Re: major changes, I think not. But it seems like there is also a demand for some RPCs not to be set in stone as part of the protocol, but instead to be more agile. We will need to try to balance that with a need for a standardized RPC API.)

author: bridge-bot
content:
<yashasvi_yc7> I am deep into 4337 Bundlers and Paymasters, so I am generally researching and keeping myself up to date with 7560 and other AA EIPs/ERCs and also to figure out how the landscape will look like in a post Native AA world. 
Have also looked at implementing it in Reth
Happy to chat further in DMs on this! :) (re @eliastzr: Like what is your work on 7560 in general)
